database

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains all needed methods for interacting with the database.
    Author:
    Andreas, Bjarke and Joakim

      • deleteAll

        public void deleteAll()
               throws java.sql.SQLException
        Deletes all within each table in the database. This is done to avoid left-overs from earlier saved games.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • saveGame

        public void saveGame(java.util.ArrayList<User> users,
                     Brewery[] breweryFields,
                     Shipping[] shippingFields,
                     Street[] streetFields,
                     int userTurn)
              throws java.sql.SQLException
        Method which will call all needed methods that is needed to save a whole game.
        Parameters:
        users - The users who are in play.
        breweryFields -
        shippingFields -
        streetFields -
        userTurn - Variable to determine who is up next.
